lead_paragraph: New York Giants quarterback Eli Manning said on Wednesday his older brother Peyton Manning does not need to win a second Super Bowl to secure his legacy as one of the NFL's greatest signal callers.

headline.print_headline: Peyton Doesn't Need Another Super Bowl to Secure Legacy: Eli
headline.main: Peyton Doesn't Need Another Super Bowl to Secure Legacy: Eli

snippet: New York Giants quarterback Eli Manning said on Wednesday his older brother Peyton Manning does not need to win a second Super Bowl to secure his legacy as one of the NFL's greatest signal callers....
